the following three

which wants to look inwards and third
there's nothing we can do about

of these propositions all of which sound
reasonable are not
true in fact our us partisan ship goes
all the way back to the very beginning
of the
Republic it was geographically

and
partisanship and that technology is the

subtly Supply designed entity that has

it's possible to do that and giving us

disagreement when that's possible now in
order to tell you this story I want to

factional disagreement and partisanship
was born there actually was a birth

partisanship snapped into
place the person who's at the core of

riding high he himself was the Einstein

to give him his due he knew
it in a period of time of just 3 years
from 1785 to 1788 he had conceived
theorized designed passed and gotten

give you some sense of the enormity of
what that accomplishment actually was
although Madison couldn't have known it
at the time today that same
constitutional technology that he
invented is still in use not only in the
the us but 230 years later in places
like Canada
India South Africa Brazil so an

technology to manage

believed that having solved this problem
the country would run smoothly and that
he had designed a technology that would
minimize
the results of faction so there would be

thought he had designed a constitution
that was against political parties and
would make them
unnecessary and he had gotten an

called Alexander

where Madison didn't speak to a woman
except for once until he was 42 years

happily ever after for 40

it would be immortal his
phrase and a manufacturing policy that

that they violated the very nature of

and they should go back to the values

the values of the Revolution and those

less trade Hamilton responded to this by

it happened because in the structure of
